fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.SubmitPPCon"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var jsonData={};\\nvar disputeArray=[];\\njsonData.templateName=\\"CEM6212-Contractor.xdp\\";\\njsonData.RelatedPerson={\\"Caltrans\\":\\"0\\"\,\\"Contractor\\":\\"1\\"};\\nif(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRB\\"){\\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": DateDRB.value\,\\n \\"DisputeMeetingID\\": DisputeMeetIDHide.value\,\\n \\"REName\\": ResidentEngineerDRB.value\,\\n \\"REPhoneNo\\": PhoneNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": ContractorDRB.value\\n };\\n}\\nelse if(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRA\\"){\\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRA.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": DateDRA.value\,\\n \\"DisputeMeetingID\\": DisputeMeetIDHide.value\,\\n \\"REName\\": ResidentEngineerDRA.value\,\\n \\"REPhoneNo\\": PhoneNumberDRA.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": ContractorDRA.value\\n };\\n}\\nvar PCRArray=[];\\nvar PCRList = PCPPPCon.Row1PPCon.instanceManager.instances;\\nfor(var i=0;i < PCPPPCon.Row1PPCon.instanceManager.instanceCount;i++){\\n if(i!==0){\\n \\tvar eachPCR={};\\n eachPCR.PCRNo = PCRList[i].tableItem11.value;\\n eachPCR.Description = PCRList[i].tableItem12.value;\\n \\teachPCR.DollarValue=PCRList[i].tableItem13.value.toString().substring(2);\\n eachPCR.DelayDays=PCRList[i].tableItem14.value;\\n eachPCR.SupplementalDate=PCRList[i].tableItem15.value;\\n eachPCR.DateREResponseTOSPCR=PCRList[i].tableItem16.value;\\n eachPCR.DateRefer=PCRList[i].tableItem17.value;\\n PCRArray.push(eachPCR);\\n }\\n}\\njsonData.DisputeDetails=PCRArray;\\njsonData.DisputeBackground={\\"Background\\": backgroundPPCon.value};\\njsonData.ContractorsPosition={\\"PositionCon\\": contractorPPCon.value};\\njsonData.FilePaths=FilePathsPPCon.value;\\njsonData.SelectDRADRB=SelectDRADRB.value;\\njsonData.userRole=userRole.value;\\njsonData.ea=ea.value;\\njsonData.district=district.value;\\njsonData.userID=userID.value;\\nvar count = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instanceCount-1;\\nvar disList = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances;\\nfor(var i=0;i < count;i++){\\n if(disList[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n jsonData.MeetingType = disList[i].table1_item3.value;\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\nxmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\nurl = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/InsertPositionPaperRecord';\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n //data: data1\,\\n success: function (data) {\\n //console.log(data);\\n PreviewPPCon.visible=true;\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n //this block is executed when server encounters any problem\\n // alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n});\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

[{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.PreviewPPCon"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//jsonData.SelectDRADRB=SelectDRADRB.value;\\n//jsonData.userRole=userRole.value;\\nvar MeetingTy=\\"\\";\\nvar count = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instanceCount-1;\\nvar disList = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances;\\nfor(var i=0;i < count;i++){\\n if(disList[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n MeetingTy = disList[i].table1_item3.value;\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\n//console.log(MeetingTy);\\nvar filename = district.value+\\"-\\"+ea.value+\\"-\\"+SelectDRADRB.value+\\"-\\"+MeetingTy+\\"-Position Paper-\\"+userRole.value;\\nguidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('http://localhost:8080/rest/services/FirstApplication/processes/CheckLocalFilesAccess?filename='+filename\,'NEW_TAB');\\n\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click:
[{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.ButtonsPanelPPCon.button_21011311681655824812250"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var count = guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager\\").instanceCount-1;\\nvar meetingType\,disputeID;\\nvar disList = guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances\\");\\nfor(var i=0;i < count;i++){\\n if(disList[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n meetingType = disList[i].table1_item3.value;\\n disputeID = disList[i].table1_item1.value;\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\nvar jsonData = {\\n \\"ea\\" : guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"ea\\").value\,\\n \\"district\\" : guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"district\\").value\,\\n \\"DisputeID\\" : disputeID\,\\n \\"MeetingType\\" : meetingType\,\\n \\"DRType\\" : guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"SelectDRADRB\\").value\,\\n \\"role\\" : \\"CONTRACTOR\\"\\n};\\nxmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\nurl = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetRecommResponseDetails';\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n success: function (data) {\\n //console.log(data);\\n //guideBridge.setFocus(ReqClariPPCon.somExpression);\\n var recom_created_date = new Date(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"RecomCreatedDate\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n var todaydate = new Date();\\n if(SelectDRADRB.value === \\"DRB\\" && meetingType===\\"Traditional\\"){\\n recom_created_date.setDate(recom_created_date.getDate() + 10); \\n ReqClariDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n if(recom_created_date <= todaydate){\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=false;\\n }\\n else{\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=true;\\n }\\n recom_created_date.setDate(recom_created_date.getDate() + 20); \\n ReqRecDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n ReqResDueDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n if(recom_created_date <= todaydate){\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.enabled=false;\\n ResponseRecomPPCon.enabled=false;\\n }\\n else{\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.enabled=true;\\n ResponseRecomPPCon.enabled=true;\\n }\\n }\\n else if(SelectDRADRB.value === \\"DRA\\" && meetingType===\\"Traditional\\"){\\n recom_created_date.setDate(recom_created_date.getDate() + 7);\\n ReqClariDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n if(recom_created_date <= todaydate){\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=false;\\n }\\n else{\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=true;\\n }\\n recom_created_date.setDate(recom_created_date.getDate() + 3); \\n ReqRecDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n ReqResDueDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n if(recom_created_date <= todaydate){\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.enabled=false;\\n ResponseRecomPPCon.enabled=false; \\n }\\n else{\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.enabled=true;\\n ResponseRecomPPCon.enabled=true;\\n }\\n }\\n /*assign existing data*/\\n jsonData = JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"RecomDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n if(typeof(jsonData.RecomDetails.Details)!==\\"undefined\\"){\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\n \\tif(jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.REQUEST_CLARIFICATION!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\tReqClarifyInputPPCon.value=jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.REQUEST_CLARIFICATION;\\n }\\n \\tif(jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.REQUEST_RECONSIDERATION_NEW_INFO!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\tReqRecNewInfoCheck.value=jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.REQUEST_RECONSIDERATION_NEW_INFO;\\n }\\n \\tif(jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.REQUEST_RECONSIDERATION!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\tReqResInputPPCon.value=jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.REQUEST_RECONSIDERATION;\\n }\\n \\tif(jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.RESPONSE!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\tReqResponseCKPPCon.value=jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.RESPONSE;\\n }\\n \\tif(jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.RESPONSE_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\tReqConResDatePPCon.value=jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.RESPONSE_DATE;\\n }\\n \\tif(jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.RESPONSE_COMMENTS!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\tReqRejComPPCon.value=jsonData.RecomDetails.Details.RESPONSE_COMMENTS;\\n }\\n }\\n ReqClaSucMssgePPCon.value=\\"

\\";\\n ReqClaErrMssgePPCon.value=\\"

\\";\\n ReqRecSucMssgePPCon.value=\\"

\\";\\n ReqRecErrMssgePPCon.value=\\"

\\";\\n ReqSubSucMssgePPCon.value=\\"

\\";\\n ReqSubErrMssgePPCon.value=\\"

\\";\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n //this block is executed when server encounters any problem\\n // alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n});\\nfunction constructMonth(date){\\n var month = date.getMonth();\\n //console.log(month);\\n if(month<9){\\n return \\"0\\"+(month+1);\\n }\\n else{\\n return month+1;\\n }\\n}"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
